resources.string:
Warning:
 When you see this text, you have successfully installed the application on your Android device. 
 This app is to detect if your phone's system signature is Android's default signature. 
 This signature file exists in the Android source code, Android is open source, so this signature is available to everyone. 
 This shows that your Android device is at risk. If you are worried about the security of your device, it is recommended that you replace AndroidOS as soon as possible.
 Get the source code of this application and signature file:https://github.com/h4de5ing/TestSystemPermission
